title: Healing Meditation Supplement by Kirby de Lanerolle | WOW Media
description: Length : 29 mins Speaker : Kirby de Lanerolle (WOWLife Church)
cleaned_text: Description Walk into an accelerated healing with this guided healing meditation that will re-wire your neurons and improve your ability to visualize the wholeness of heaven and supernatural health. These guided meditations by Kirby de Lanerolle are here to help you walk more potently in the reality of the cross and the kingdom of God with extreme clarity and resolution. Once you buy this you can listen to it any time you like. You will have life-time access. You can also download the MP3 file to keep. CHECKOUT THE
